Frank Herbert

birth name: Frank Patrick Herbert

born: 10/8/1920

died: 2/11/1986

nationality: USA

View Reference Info

Biography

American science-fiction writer noted as the author of the best-selling Dune series of futuristic novels, a group of highly complex works that explored such themes as ecology, human evolution, the consequences of genetic manipulation, and mystical and pyschic possibilities. - Merriam-Webster's Encyclopedia of Literaturemore
